Dobbs: The November surprise

Posted on Thursday, November 08, 2007

Lou Dobbs has a very interesting theory concerning the upcoming presidential election. The complete article also includes a quick plug for his new book, but if you can get over that, it turns out to be quite thought provoking. Full Story via CNN.
